import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios'; function ProductScreen (props) { const [products, setProduct] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get("/api/products"); setProduct(data); } fetchData(); return () => { // }; }, []) console.log(props.match.params.id) const product = products.find(x=> x._id === props.match.params.id); return
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews} Reviews)
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Status: {product.status}
  • Qty:
} export default ProductScreen;
